text: Daniel Ronald Cox, better known as Ronny Cox, (born July 23, 1938) is an American actor, singer, songwriter and storyteller. He is best known for his roles as Drew Ballinger in Deliverance, Ozak Bule in Bound for Glory, Colonel Kerby in Taps, Lieutenant Andrew Bogomil in both Beverly Hills Cop and Beverly Hills Cop II, Dick Jones in RoboCop, Vilos Cohaagen in Total Recall, Vice President Kinsey in several episodes of Stargate SG-1 and Captain Edward Jellico in two episodes of Star Trek: The Next Generation. == Other websites == * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Mexico Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from New Mexico Category:Writers from New Mexico
title: Ronny Cox
